'''Iter Ad Astra Abyssosque''' is an outdoor gift set favored by the companions: [[Bennett]], [[Qiqi]], [[Chongyun]], [[Fischl]], [[Albedo]], [[Aloy]] and [[Mika]].

It is obtained from the [[Serenitea Pot/Realm Depot|Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=240}}.

==Trivia==
* Iter Ad Astra Abyssosque is an outdoor set, but contains {{LL|"Scholar's Weariness"|,}} which is an indoor furnishing. This allows "Scholar's Weariness" to be placed outdoors.
